title.rendered: EPHI has Upgraded ICT capacity and system

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

The existing data center in EPHI has been upgraded with Network infrastructure, Deployment of Powerful servers and Storage device which can be used for applications database implementation with virtualization technology. Within the coming 6 months modular datacenter with high availability and security will be implemented with the help of the World Bank fund.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
